intro: Epilobium pyrricholophum f. kiusianum, commonly known as the Kiusi's willow herb, is a flowering plant belonging to the Onagraceae family. It is a herbaceous perennial that typically grows in moist, temperate environments. The plant features lanceolate leaves with a hairy surface and produces showy, pink to reddish-purple flowers. It is characterized by its distinct floral morphology and is often found in wet meadows and streambanks. This form is a variant of the species Epilobium pyrricholophum, distinguished by specific morphological traits.
